intro: Elatostema catalonanum, commonly known as the Catalonian elatostema, is a small herbaceous plant native to the mountainous regions of southeastern Europe. It belongs to the family Urticaceae, which includes nettle species, and is characterized by its delicate, hairy leaves. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forests and rocky slopes. Its small, greenish-white flowers are arranged in clusters and bloom in late spring. Elatostema catalonanum is noted for its rapid growth and ability to thrive in nutrient-poor soils.
